# Terminal

## Why?

* Automation/scriptable
* "Deployment" to larger computers
* Access to command line tools

## Basics

* Navigating

```bash
cd my/folder/
```

```bash
ls
```

```bash
pwd
```

* Paths
* `touch`
* Tab-completion
